Create a summary table with number of reads and unique alpha/beta chains observed for each sample

summarize_data.Rd

Create a summary table with number of reads and unique alpha/beta chains observed for each sample

Usage

summarize_data(data)

Arguments

data

a TIRTLseqData object

See also

Other repertoire_analysis: TCRdist(), TCRdist_cpp(), calculate_diversity(), cluster_tcrs(), get_all_div_metrics(), get_all_tcrs(), get_pair_stats(), get_paired_by_read_fraction_range()
